# Optimize unicorn studio's background for better UX (2025-11-13 15:47Z)

_**User (2025-11-13 04:58Z)**_

- [ ] Add CSS optimizations for GPU acceleration and smooth rendering

**Chunk 2**

```diff
@@ -9,6 +9,52 @@
    const elementRef = useRef(null);
    const sceneRef = useRef(null);
+   const observerRef = useRef(null);
+   const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
  
    useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     // Intersection Observer for visibility-based loading and pausing
+     if (elementRef.current) {
+       observerRef.current = new IntersectionObserver(
+         (entries) =&gt; {
+           entries.forEach((entry) =&gt; {
+             setIsVisible(entry.isIntersecting);
+             
+             // Pause/resume animation based on visibility
+             if (sceneRef.current &amp;&amp; window.UnicornStudio) {
+               try {
+                 if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+                   // Resume animation when visible
+                   if (sceneRef.current.play) sceneRef.current.play();
+                 } else {
+                   // Pause animation when not visible
+                   if (sceneRef.current.pause) sceneRef.current.pause();
+                 }
+               } catch (e) {
+                 // Silently handle if pause/play methods don&#39;t exist
+               }
+             }
+           });
+         },
+         {
+           root: null,
+           rootMargin: &#39;50px&#39;, // Start loading slightly before visible
+           threshold: 0.1
+         }
+       );
+ 
+       observerRef.current.observe(elementRef.current);
+     }
+ 
+     return () =&gt; {
+       if (observerRef.current) {
+         observerRef.current.disconnect();
+       }
+     };
+   }, []);
+ 
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     // Only initialize when visible
+     if (!isVisible) return;
+ 
      // Initialize script (optimized based on Framer component)
      const initializeScript = (callback) =&gt; {
```

Adding CSS optimizations for the Unicorn Studio embed:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: src/layouts/Layout.astro</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 57, lines removed: undefined

```diff
@@ -965,3 +965,60 @@
      color: #0a0a0a;
    }
+ 
+   /* Unicorn Studio Embed Performance Optimizations */
+   .unicorn-studio-embed {
+     /* GPU acceleration */
+     transform: translateZ(0);
+     will-change: transform;
+     backface-visibility: hidden;
+     perspective: 1000px;
+     
+     /* Smooth rendering */
+     image-rendering: -webkit-optimize-contrast;
+     image-rendering: crisp-edges;
+     
+     /* Reduce repaints */
+     contain: layout style paint;
+     
+     /* Optimize compositing */
+     isolation: isolate;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Reduce motion for users who prefer it */
+   @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
+     .unicorn-studio-embed {
+       animation: none !important;
+       transition: none !important;
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   /* Performance optimizations for hero sections with Unicorn Studio */
+   .hero-section-fullpage {
+     /* Optimize compositing layer */
+     contain: layout style paint;
+     transform: translateZ(0);
+     will-change: scroll-position;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Optimize content overlay to prevent repaints */
+   .hero-content-overlay {
+     /* Create new stacking context */
+     isolation: isolate;
+     /* GPU acceleration */
+     transform: translateZ(0);
+     will-change: transform;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Mobile optimizations */
+   @media (max-width: 768px) {
+     .unicorn-studio-embed {
+       /* Further reduce quality on mobile for better performance */
+       image-rendering: auto;
+     }
+     
+     .hero-section-fullpage {
+       /* Reduce will-change on mobile to save memory */
+       will-change: auto;
+     }
+   }
  &lt;/style&gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>

## Optimizations completed

### 1. UnicornStudioEmbed component
- Reduced FPS: 60 → 30 (24 for low-end devices)
- Enabled lazy loading: `data-us-lazyload="true"`
- Reduced DPI: 1.5 → 1
- Visibility-based loading: Intersection Observer loads only when visible
- Auto-pause: pauses when not in viewport
- Device detection: adjusts settings for low-end devices
- GPU acceleration: added CSS properties for smoother rendering
- Async script loading: script loads with `async` and `defer`

### 2. Page updates
- Changed from `client:load` to `client:visible` on:
  - `index.astro`
  - `kiosks.astro`
  - `contact.astro`

### 3. CSS optimizations
- GPU acceleration: `transform: translateZ(0)`, `will-change`
- Containment: `contain: layout style paint` to reduce repaints
- Compositing: `isolation: isolate` for better layer management
- Mobile optimizations: reduced quality on mobile devices
- Reduced motion support: respects user preferences

## Performance improvements
- Faster initial load: lazy loading and visibility-based initialization
- Smoother scrolling: reduced FPS and GPU acceleration
- Lower CPU usage: auto-pause when not visible
- Better mobile performance: adaptive settings based on device capabilities
- Reduced memory usage: containment and optimized compositing

Pages should feel smoother and less choppy. The animation loads only when visible and pauses when scrolled out of view, reducing resource usage.

---
